<!-- Beginner issue: add contributing file -->
# Beginner: Add a `CONTRIBUTING.md` with short contribution steps

Description
--
Add a short `CONTRIBUTING.md` to the repository root describing how to open a PR, run the dev server, and format commits. Keep it concise (5-10 lines).

Acceptance criteria
--
- A new `CONTRIBUTING.md` file is added to the repo root with simple contribution steps.
- The doc includes commands to run the site locally and how to create a branch/PR.

Notes
--
- This is a documentation task perfect for first-time contributors.
